feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

entry.title: [RBX8][Network] - R809R05
entry.content:
Apr 9, 23:35 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 09/04/2022 23:06 UTC
End Time : 09/04/2022 23:11 UTC
Service impact : Following a faulty power supply that caused all the servers on the power strip to reboot, we had a 10 minute downtime on 8 servers in this rack. All servers are back up.
Root cause : A faulty power supply

End Time : 09/04/2022 02:34 UTC

Root cause : Network device faulty

entry.title: [GRA2][Dedicated servers] - G223A13
entry.content:
Apr 8, 16:00 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 08/04/2022 11:29 UTC
End Time : 08/04/2022 15:51 UTC
Service impact : None
Root cause : Human error
Incident is fixed. Everything is back to normal.

Apr 8, 12:02 UTC
Identified - Start time : 08/04/2022 11:29 UTC
Service impact : 5 servers down in rack G223A13
Root cause : Incident is due to a leak.
Ongoing actions : Our teams have fixed the leak . The servers are are currently being re-commissioned.

entry.title: [BHS][Dedicated Servers] - Public network on game server
entry.content:
Apr 8, 15:26 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 08/04/2022 13:45 UTC
Service impact : We are experiencing increased latency and unreachable hosts on the public network of game family servers.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of these disturbances

entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated servers] - 46F05/46F06/46F08/46F09/46F10
entry.content:
Apr 8, 10:54 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 08/04/2022 08:20 UTC
End time : 08/04/2022 10:38 UTC
Root cause : The incident was caused by a leak.

The incident is over, all servers are available again.

Apr 8, 08:36 UTC
Identified - Start time : 08/04/2022 08:20 UTC
Service impact : Servers unavailable on racks 46F05/46F06/46F08/46F09/46F10.
Ongoing actions : Our teams have identified the cause of this unavailability and are currently restoring the service. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.
